evals.name: basic-geo-audit
evals.prompt: Audit example.com for GEO readiness. I want to know how well the site is optimized for AI search and citation.
evals.expected_output: A structured report showing scores across AI Accessibility, Structured Data, Content Citability, and Technical Setup dimensions with a final grade.

evals.name: llms-txt-audit
evals.prompt: Check if geoly.ai has a proper llms.txt file and evaluate their overall GEO readiness.
evals.expected_output: Audit report including llms.txt validation and comprehensive GEO score.

evals.name: schema-validation
evals.prompt: Run a structured data audit on anthropic.com. I need to know if their schema markup is AI-friendly.
evals.expected_output: Detailed breakdown of JSON-LD schemas, Organization, WebSite, Article schemas with pass/fail status.
